sentence.Network_en: I will betroth you in faithfulness, and you will acknowledge the LORD.
sentence.Network_cn: 也以诚实聘你归我, 你就必认识我耶和华.

sentence.Network_en: Betroth: To promise to give in marriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 订婚: 对结婚的承诺.

sentence.Network_en: Hos 2:20 I will betroth you in faithfulness, and you will acknowledge the LORD.
sentence.Network_cn: 何西阿书2:20.也以老实聘你回我 、 你就必认识我耶和华.
